Class BalancingTreeCheck

java.lang.Object
BalancingTreeCheck
public class BalancingTreeCheck
extends java.lang.Object
The class to determine if a binary search tree is avl or is red-black tree for part 2

      Returns:
      are there any red consecutive or not

    • isSameRootToLeaf

      private static int isSameRootToLeaf​(RedBlackTree.RedBlackNode root)
      The helper method of isRedConsecutive method that checks if size of black nodes on the paths from the root to the leaves are same or not recursively
      Parameters:
      root - starting root
      Returns:
      if the tree is red-black returns the size of black nodes either it returns -1
